error.title: Source directory not collected
error.description:
## Source directory not collected
Instance is marked for in place publishing. Its 'originalDirname' must be collected. Contact OP developer to modify collector.
error.detail:
### __Detailed Info__ (optional)
In place publishing uses source directory and file name in resulting path and file name of published item. For this instance all required metadata weren't filled. This is not recoverable error, unless instance itself is removed. Collector for this instance must be updated for instance to be published.

error.title: Source file not in project dir
error.description:
## Source file not in project dir
Path '{original_dirname}' not in project folder. Please publish from inside of project folder.
### How to repair?
Restart publish after you moved source file into project directory.
